actions.text: Amendment SA 2277 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 2277 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Toomey to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184) To impose sanctions with respect to foreign persons involved in the erosion of certain obligations of China with respect to Hong Kong.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2277 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Toomey to Amendment SA 2301.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2277 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To impose sanctions with respect to foreign persons involved in the erosion of certain obligations of China with respect to Hong Kong.
